Key Match Events: Harry Wilson scored in the 11th minute, followed by Brennan Johnson's goal in the 29th minute, giving Wales a 2-0 lead at halftime.
In the 69th minute, Logi Tomasson scored to pull Iceland back to 2-1.
Three minutes later, Danny Ward accidentally scored an own goal for Iceland, equalizing the match at 2-2.
Post-Match Reflections: Wales remain unbeaten under Craig Bellamy after three games, currently second in the group with five points.
Iceland are now third in the group with four points.
Turkey leads the group with five points from their win against Montenegro.
